languages.text: {n}Инквизитор поднимает бровь.{/n} "Вот как? Интересный ответ. Мы действительно не первый год пристально следим за Вистенцой и маленькими мерзостями, которые позволяют себе члены ее свиты. Следим и готовы положить им конец, как только они перешагнут черту и станут представлять настоящую опасность. Теперь это и ваша ответственность. Будьте бдительны".

traits.locale_text: "Точно не я. Святость ваших прав, дарованных самим Императором, не подвергается какому-либо сомнению".

languages.text: {n}He arches an eyebrow.{/n} "Is that so? Interesting. It's true, for years we've kept a close eye on Vistenza and the little depravities her retinue permits itself. And we're ready to put an end to them the moment they cross the line and become a true danger. Now this is your responsibility as well. Be vigilant."
languages.original_text: {n}Инквизитор поднимает бровь.{/n} "Вот как? Интересный ответ. Мы действительно не первый год пристально следим за Вистенцой и маленькими мерзостями, которые позволяют себе члены ее свиты. Следим и готовы положить им конец, как только они перешагнут черту и станут представлять настоящую опасность. Теперь это и ваша ответственность. Будьте бдительны".

And we're ready to put an end to them the moment they cross the line and become a true danger. Now this is your responsibility as well. Be vigilant."

And we're ready to put an end to them the moment they cross the line and become a true danger. Now this is your responsibility as well. Be vigilant."

And we're ready to put an end to them the moment they cross the line and become a true danger. Now this is your responsibility as well. Be vigilant."

And we're ready to put an end to them the moment they cross the line and become a true danger. Now this is your responsibility as well. Be vigilant."

And we're ready to put an end to them the moment they cross the line and become a true danger. Now this is your responsibility as well. Be vigilant."

languages.text: {n}カルカサルは片眉を上げる。{/n}「ふむ。面白いことを言う。それが真実なら、我々はヴィステンツァと、多少の堕落を受容した従者とをよく見張っているわけか。そして奴らが一線を越え、本物の危険になる時は引導を渡す用意もある、と。本件はお前の責任でもある。気を抜くな」
languages.original_text: {n}He arches an eyebrow.{/n} "Is that so? Interesting. It's true, for years we've kept a close eye on Vistenza and the little depravities her retinue permits itself. And we're ready to put an end to them the moment they cross the line and become a true danger. Now this is your responsibility as well. Be vigilant."

traits.locale_text: {n}カルカサルは片眉を上げる。{/n}「ふむ。面白いことを言う。それが真実なら、我々はヴィステンツァと、多少の堕落を受容した従者とをよく見張っているわけか。そして奴らが一線を越え、本物の危険になる時は引導を渡す用意もある、と。本件はお前の責任でもある。気を抜くな」

languages.original_text: {n}He arches an eyebrow.{/n} "Is that so? Interesting. It's true, for years we've kept a close eye on Vistenza and the little depravities her retinue permits itself. And we're ready to put an end to them the moment they cross the line and become a true danger. Now this is your responsibility as well. Be vigilant."

languages.text: {n}他蹙起了眉毛。{/n}“是吗？有意思。确实，这么多年来，我们一直盯着维丝坦萨和她那群自甘堕落的随行人员。一旦他们越过了红线，变成了真正的威胁，我们就会立刻消灭他们。这也是你的责任。保持警惕。”
languages.original_text: {n}He arches an eyebrow.{/n} "Is that so? Interesting. It's true, for years we've kept a close eye on Vistenza and the little depravities her retinue permits itself. And we're ready to put an end to them the moment they cross the line and become a true danger. Now this is your responsibility as well. Be vigilant."

traits.locale_text: {n}他蹙起了眉毛。{/n}“是吗？有意思。确实，这么多年来，我们一直盯着维丝坦萨和她那群自甘堕落的随行人员。一旦他们越过了红线，变成了真正的威胁，我们就会立刻消灭他们。这也是你的责任。保持警惕。”

languages.text: {n}Arquea una ceja.{/n} «¿Ah, sí? Interesante. Es cierto que hemos vigilado a Vistenza y las pequeñas depravaciones que su séquito se permite. Y estamos listos para poner fin a la situación en el momento en el que se pase de la raya y se convierta en una verdadera amenaza. Ahora comparte esta responsabilidad. Préstele atención».
languages.original_text: {n}He arches an eyebrow.{/n} "Is that so? Interesting. It's true, for years we've kept a close eye on Vistenza and the little depravities her retinue permits itself. And we're ready to put an end to them the moment they cross the line and become a true danger. Now this is your responsibility as well. Be vigilant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Arquea una ceja.{/n} «¿Ah, sí? Interesante. Es cierto que hemos vigilado a Vistenza y las pequeñas depravaciones que su séquito se permite. Y estamos listos para poner fin a la situación en el momento en el que se pase de la raya y se convierta en una verdadera amenaza. Ahora comparte esta responsabilidad. Préstele atención».

languages.text: {n}Il hausse un sourcil.{/n} « Vraiment ? Intéressant. Il est vrai que nous gardons Vistenza à l'œil, de même que les menues perversions que se permet son entourage, et que nous n'hésiterons pas à intervenir à l'instant même où elles commenceront à représenter un véritable danger. Maintenant, il en va également de votre responsabilité. Soyez {mf|vigilant|vigilante}. »
languages.original_text: {n}He arches an eyebrow.{/n} "Is that so? Interesting. It's true, for years we've kept a close eye on Vistenza and the little depravities her retinue permits itself. And we're ready to put an end to them the moment they cross the line and become a true danger. Now this is your responsibility as well. Be vigilant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il hausse un sourcil.{/n} « Vraiment ? Intéressant. Il est vrai que nous gardons Vistenza à l'œil, de même que les menues perversions que se permet son entourage, et que nous n'hésiterons pas à intervenir à l'instant même où elles commenceront à représenter un véritable danger. Maintenant, il en va également de votre responsabilité. Soyez {mf|vigilant|vigilante}. »

languages.text: {n}Er zieht eine Augenbraue hoch.{/n} "Tatsächlich? Interessant. Es stimmt, wir überwachen Vistenza und die kleinen Abartigkeiten ihres Gefolges seit Jahren. Und wir sind bereit, ihnen ein Ende zu bereiten, sobald sie die Linie überschreiten und zu einer echten Gefahr werden. Jetzt fällt das auch in Eure Verantwortung. Seid wachsam."
languages.original_text: {n}He arches an eyebrow.{/n} "Is that so? Interesting. It's true, for years we've kept a close eye on Vistenza and the little depravities her retinue permits itself. And we're ready to put an end to them the moment they cross the line and become a true danger. Now this is your responsibility as well. Be vigilant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er zieht eine Augenbraue hoch.{/n} "Tatsächlich? Interessant. Es stimmt, wir überwachen Vistenza und die kleinen Abartigkeiten ihres Gefolges seit Jahren. Und wir sind bereit, ihnen ein Ende zu bereiten, sobald sie die Linie überschreiten und zu einer echten Gefahr werden. Jetzt fällt das auch in Eure Verantwortung. Seid wachsam."

languages.text: {n}Tek kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Öyle mi? İlginç. Vistenza'yı ve maiyetindekilerin kendilerini tutamayıp açık ettiği ufak tefek ahlaksızlıkları yıllardır izliyoruz. Çizgiyi aştıkları ve gerçekten tehlike oluşturdukları an onları bertaraf etmeye hazırız. Bu artık senin de sorumluluğun. Dikkatli ol."
languages.original_text: {n}He arches an eyebrow.{/n} "Is that so? Interesting. It's true, for years we've kept a close eye on Vistenza and the little depravities her retinue permits itself. And we're ready to put an end to them the moment they cross the line and become a true danger. Now this is your responsibility as well. Be vigilant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tek kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Öyle mi? İlginç. Vistenza'yı ve maiyetindekilerin kendilerini tutamayıp açık ettiği ufak tefek ahlaksızlıkları yıllardır izliyoruz ve çizgiyi aştıkları ve gerçek bir tehlike hâline geldikleri an onları bertaraf etmeye hazırız. Bu artık senin de sorumluluğun. Dikkatli ol."
